pullRequest.title: add passwordless WebAuthn logins
pullRequest.bodyText:
This implements passwordless WebAuthn logins using our Hardware Security SDK. Passwordless WebAuthn logins work with Nextcloud 19 out of the box.
As in our previous PR:

source code is here: https://github.com/cotechde/hwsecurity
100% GPLv3
not depending on Google Play Services

Thanks
Thanks to https://portknox.net for providing a Nextcloud 19 test instance!
Screenshots

Click on small link "Log in with a device"

Enter username, press "Log in". Our dialog comes up: Enter your security key PIN

Hold security key against NFC or plug in USB

You are logged in without entering your password

beforeCommit.message:
add WebAuthn support using hwsecurity-fido2:4.1.0

Signed-off-by: Dominik Schürmann <dominik@schuermann.eu>
